Source code for cp1.utils.ta_generator

"""ta_generator.py

Constructs a set of TA equations based on the provided input.
Author: Tameem Samawi (tsamawi@cra.com)
"""
import random
from cp1.data_objects.processing.ta import TA
from cp1.data_objects.mdl.mdl_id import MdlId
from cp1.data_objects.mdl.kbps import Kbps
from cp1.common.exception_class import TAGeneratorRangeException
from cp1.common.exception_class import TAGeneratorInitializationException



[docs]class TAGenerator:
    def __init__(
            self,
            lower_minimum_voice_bandwidth,
            upper_minimum_voice_bandwidth,
            lower_minimum_safety_bandwidth,
            upper_minimum_safety_bandwidth,
            lower_scaling_factor,
            upper_scaling_factor,
            lower_c,
            upper_c):

        if not isinstance(lower_minimum_voice_bandwidth, Kbps):
            raise TAGeneratorInitializationException(
                'lower_minimum_voice_bandwidth must be instance of BandwidthRate: {0}'.format(
                    lower_minimum_voice_bandwidth),
                'TAGenerator.validate_ranges')
        if not isinstance(upper_minimum_voice_bandwidth, Kbps):
            raise TAGeneratorInitializationException(
                'upper_minimum_voice_bandwidth must be instance of BandwidthRate: {0}'.format(
                    upper_minimum_voice_bandwidth),
                'TAGenerator.validate_ranges')
        if not isinstance(lower_minimum_safety_bandwidth, Kbps):
            raise TAGeneratorInitializationException(
                'lower_minimum_safety_bandwidth must be instance of BandwidthRate: {0}'.format(
                    lower_minimum_safety_bandwidth),
                'TAGenerator.validate_ranges')
        if not isinstance(upper_minimum_safety_bandwidth, Kbps):
            raise TAGeneratorInitializationException(
                'upper_minimum_safety_bandwidth must be instance of BandwidthRate: {0}'.format(
                    upper_minimum_safety_bandwidth),
                'TAGenerator.validate_ranges')
        if not isinstance(lower_scaling_factor, (float, int)):
            raise TAGeneratorInitializationException(
                'lower_scaling_factor must be instance of float: {0}'.format(
                    lower_scaling_factor),
                'TAGenerator.validate_ranges')
        if not isinstance(upper_scaling_factor, (float, int)):
            raise TAGeneratorInitializationException(
                'upper_scaling_factor must be instance of float: {0}'.format(
                    upper_scaling_factor),
                'TAGenerator.validate_ranges')
        if not isinstance(lower_c, (float, int)):
            raise TAGeneratorInitializationException(
                'lower_c must be instance of float or int: {0}'.format(
                    lower_c), 'TAGenerator.validate_ranges')
        if not isinstance(upper_c, (float, int)):
            raise TAGeneratorInitializationException(
                'upper_c must be instance of float or int: {0}'.format(
                    upper_c), 'TAGenerator.validate_ranges')

        self.lower_minimum_voice_bandwidth = lower_minimum_voice_bandwidth
        self.upper_minimum_voice_bandwidth = upper_minimum_voice_bandwidth
        self.lower_minimum_safety_bandwidth = lower_minimum_safety_bandwidth
        self.upper_minimum_safety_bandwidth = upper_minimum_safety_bandwidth
        self.lower_scaling_factor = float(lower_scaling_factor)
        self.upper_scaling_factor = float(upper_scaling_factor)
        self.lower_c = float(lower_c)
        self.upper_c = float(upper_c)

        self.validate_ranges()


[docs]    def generate(self, num_tas):
        random.seed(1)
        MdlId.clear()
        ta_equations = []
        for x in range(num_tas):
            voice = random.randint(
                self.lower_minimum_voice_bandwidth.value,
                self.upper_minimum_voice_bandwidth.value)
            safety = random.randint(
                self.lower_minimum_safety_bandwidth.value,
                self.upper_minimum_safety_bandwidth.value)
            scaling_factor = random.uniform(
                self.lower_scaling_factor, self.upper_scaling_factor)
            c = random.uniform(self.lower_c, self.upper_c)

            ta_equations.append(
                TA(
                    id_=MdlId('TA{0}'.format(x+1)),
                    minimum_voice_bandwidth=Kbps(voice),
                    minimum_safety_bandwidth=Kbps(safety),
                    scaling_factor=scaling_factor,
                    c=c))

        return ta_equations


    def _validate_ranges(self):
        if self.upper_minimum_voice_bandwidth.value > 200:
            raise TAGeneratorRangeException(
                'upper_minimum_voice_bandwidth must be less than 200: {0}'.format(
                    self.upper_minimum_voice_bandwidth.value),
                'TAGenerator.validate_ranges')
        if self.upper_minimum_safety_bandwidth.value > 100:
            raise TAGeneratorRangeException(
                'upper_minimum_safety_bandwidth must be less than 100: {0}'.format(
                    self.upper_minimum_safety_bandwidth.value),
                'TAGenerator.validate_ranges')
        if self.lower_scaling_factor < 0:
            raise TAGeneratorRangeException(
                'lower_scaling_factor must be greater than 0'.format(
                    self.lower_scaling_factor),
                'TAGenerator.validate_ranges')
        if self.upper_scaling_factor > 10:
            raise TAGeneratorRangeException(
                'upper_scaling_factor must be less than 10'.format(
                    self.upper_scaling_factor),
                'TAGenerator.validate_ranges')
        if self.lower_c < 0:
            raise TAGeneratorRangeException(
                'lower_c must be greater than 0'.format(self.lower_c),
                'TAGenerator.validate_ranges')
        if self.upper_c > 1:
            raise TAGeneratorRangeException(
                'upper_c must be less than 1'.format(self.upper_c),
                'TAGenerator.validate_ranges')
        if self.lower_scaling_factor > self.upper_scaling_factor:
            raise TAGeneratorRangeException(
                'lower_scaling_factor: {0} must be less than or equal to upper_scaling_factor: {1}'.format(
                    self.lower_scaling_factor,
                    self.upper_scaling_factor),
                'TAGenerator.validate_ranges')
        if self.lower_c > self.upper_c:
            raise TAGeneratorRangeException(
                'lower_c: {0} must be less than or equal to upper_c: {1}'.format(
                    self.lower_c, self.upper_c),
                'TAGenerator.validate_ranges')
